title: Valentino’s Alessandro Michele shines from the heights of haute couture
description: Michele uses models in their 50s and 60s, saying ‘time provides grace’, while Giorgio Armani celebrates 20 years of Armani PrivéThere was never much doubt that Alessandro Michele – one of fashion’s biggest personalities and a man with a passion for capes, hats, pearls, pleats, bows, ruffs, lace and embroidery – would take to the world of haute couture like a duck to water.Michele became a star designer during his time at Gucci, but a new job at the house of Valentino has given him a shot at haute couture, the Champions League elite of fashion, where each dress is made to order with hundreds of hours of work, all done by hand. Continue reading...
author: Jess Cartner-Morley in Paris

title: American power: what does her official portrait reveal about Melania 2.0?
description: First lady’s corporate black-and-white shoot is reminiscent of The Apprentice or House of CardsAt first glance, the official portrait of the returning Flotus – soft power stance, crisp, unbuttoned Dolce & Gabbana tux, the Washington monument soaring behind her – scans so neatly with the returning administration that you’d be hard pushed to find any clues as to who Melania 2.0 is.After all, she wore a Dolce & Gabbana jacket for the same shot in 2017. The only real change this time is that she swapped the necktie for a black Ralph Lauren cummerbund, as if to sprinkle a little alpha patriotism into an otherwise blankly corporate get-up. Continue reading...
author: Morwenna Ferrier

title: Every James Bond Film, Ranked From Worst To Best
description: As the song goes, “Nobody does it better”. But which James Bond movie really does it best? Across almost six decades there have been 24 films and six actors, each an essential entry into the history of 007. And how do you rate a Bond film? The style? The action? The villain? The girl? title: How to Dress Like Shia LaBeouf: A Style Guide
description: Shia LaBeouf is a walking contradiction in the best possible way: effortlessly rugged yet meticulously curated, his style has become a prime example of modern masculinity. Whether he’s stepping out in a perfectly worn pair of boots or rocking a tailored suit with an irreverent edge, LaBeouf exudes an authenticity that’s hard to fake. author: Winnie Liu

title: 17 Popular Nordstrom Shoes, From Loafers to Snow Boots
description: Between the drop in temperature and the occasional rainy or snowy commute, winter is a convenient excuse to add some fresh shoes to the rotation, and Nordstrom is one of our favorite retailers to start our search. With its vast selection ranging from Nordstrom brands to designer options, it's easy to find a pair that fits your style at a price you're comfortable spending. After poring over the retailer's inventory, we're eyeing all of the shoes we can't wait to slip into. We've honed in on a variety of styles, including sneakers, boots, comfortable heels, and everything in between. If you're ready to give your shoe selection a winter refresh, browse our curated list of Nordstrom's most covetable shoe styles.
author: Angela Elias

title: 14 Comfortable Work Shoes For the Office and Beyond
description: When finding the perfect pair of work shoes, style ranks high on our wish lists but, naturally, so does comfort. From the subway to the office to after-work cocktails with your friends and beyond, these are the shoes you'll practically be living in daily, so it's important to shop for a pair that'll keep you feeling comfortable, supported, and chic. Ahead, we curated a list of this season's best and most comfortable work shoes for women, from slingback heels and black flats to business-casual shoes that can meet any office's dress-code requirements. Most importantly, they all have one thing in common: they'll become your go-to everyday pair. Depending on your job or daily journey, your comfort (and commute) requirements might have different needs. If you work in a more dressed-up environment with a walking commute, opt for classic, comfortable flats that you can wear with trousers. If your workplace is more casual and you drive, you can probably get away with wearing a pair of heels to spice things up. And, of course, we also made sure to include some versatile sneakers that pair well with all clothing items - and are even favorites of our own editors. Keep reading for our complete guide to the best women's work shoes. With styles from brands like Old Navy, Rothy's, and Everlane, there's something at every price point and markdown. Find your favorites and shop this season's best comfortable work shoes for standing all day.
author: Kyley Warren

title: 30 Crossbody Bags That Prove Hands-Free Is The Way To Be
description: .disclaimer{width:90%;margin-bottom:1rem}.disclaimer__lines{width:100%;margin:0 auto;border-bottom:1px solid #999;padding:0;max-width:150px}.disclaimer__copy{width:100%;max-width:355px;font-family:Brown Regular,sans-serif;font-size:.9rem;font-weight:300;line-height:1.3em;color:#333;padding:0 0 .4rem;margin:1rem auto;text-align:center} All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission. Toss the totes, shelve the shoulder bags, and retire that overstuffed clutch — at least for now. It’s time to make a case for the crossbody bag. Arguably the most low-maintenance member of the purse family, it’s hands-free, layers effortlessly over any outfit, and still looks undeniably cool. And not to sound like your mom, but it’s also ridiculously practical. Look, ma, no hands! What makes the crossbody truly unbeatable, though, is its shape-shifting versatility. From sleek crescent slings to puffy, padded styles built for winter, these bags adapt to your every need. Whether you’re drawn to structured flap bags, multitasking convertible designs, or bucket bags that are making a strong return to the spotlight, there’s a crossbody for every vibe (work, going out, winter weddings, you name it). Ahead, 30 styles we’re ready to throw over our bodies immediately. Crescent Slings Sleek and shaped to hug the body just right, the crescent sling is the crossbody of the moment. With its curved silhouette and hands-free ease, it fits your essentials without bulk — perfect for running around the city or adding a modern touch to any look. Convertible Silhouettes These multitasking wonders are like two or three bags in one. Go crossbody for ease, carry by the top handles for a polished work look, or opt for a smaller-scale style for a night out. Unquestionably the best bang for your buck. Bucket Bags There was a distinct point in the 2010s when bucket bags reigned supreme — and that energy is back in the air. The open-top design makes for easy access to lip gloss, keys, and more, while modern updates like belted straps, woven leather, and sleek minimalist shapes keep things feeling fresh. Flap Bags Flap crossbody bags are a timeless go-to. Whether you choose a classic square shape, an asymmetrical cut, or sculptural hardware with a pop of color, this silhouette always delivers. Puffy & Padded The puffed-up trend isn’t just for coats and boots — it’s taken over bags, too. Durable, lightweight, and ultra-wearable, these styles hold up to daily wear while delivering peak winter utility, whether you’re slinging Lululemon’s viral belt bag or Free People’s oversized messenger. Like what you see? How about some more R29 goodness, right here?28 Work Bags For Women — From Totes To BackpacksThis It Bag Comes From A 200-Year-Old BrandThe Five Bags You'll Be Seeing Everywhere In 2025
author: Ray Lowe

title: Copenhagen Fashion Week Is A Lesson In Minimalist Dressing With A Twist
description: The street style at any fashion week is always worth paying attention to. What better way to see how runway trends translate in real life — or, at least, in the real-life wardrobes of some of the world’s most stylish people? But Copenhagen Fashion Week always seems to pique our interest just a little bit more than other cities. There’s an effortless charm the Scandi style set brings to the Danish capital, walking the fine line between trendy and personality-forward while remaining minimalist. Everywhere you look during the Copenhagen Fashion Week Fall/Winter 2025 shows, which run from January 27 to 31, there are outfits that will fill you with inspiration for months to come. Be sure to take note, because these will undoubtedly give us a glimpse at the fashion trends that are on the cusp of being everywhere.
